title: Sites ban gamer who removed Spider-Man Pride flags
description: The user replaced them with American flags in the PC version of the Spider-Man Remastered video game.

title: Hackers may have exploited security flaws - Apple
description: Users of some models of iPhone, iPad and Mac are being urged to run "important" security update.

title: Doubts cast over Elon Musk's Twitter bot claims
description: Elon Musk thinks a third of visible Twitter accounts could be bots, but researchers have their reservations.
